name: ducsu-backend
description: DUCSU Backend API with CRUD operations and Cloudinary integration

scripts.setup: echo Setting up DUCSU Backend... && npm install && echo Dependencies installed! && echo Please update your .env file with your MongoDB and Cloudinary credentials. && echo Then run: npm run dev
scripts.check-env: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); console.log('Environment check:'); console.log('MongoDB URI:', process.env.MONGODB_URI ? '✅ Set' : '❌ Not set'); console.log('Cloudinary Cloud Name:', process.env.CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME ? '✅ Set' : '❌ Not set'); console.log('Cloudinary API Key:', process.env.CLOUDINARY_API_KEY ? '✅ Set' : '❌ Not set'); console.log('Cloudinary API Secret:', process.env.CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET ? '✅ Set' : '❌ Not set');"
